# NFTCollection class

Create a collection of one-of-one NFTs.

## Example

```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK("{{chainName}}");
const contract = await sdk.getContract(
  "{{contract_address}}",
  "nft-collection",
);
```

| Constructor                                                                                                              | Modifiers | Description                                                       |

| [(constructor)(network, address, storage, options, abi, chainId, contractWrapper)](./sdk.nftcollection._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>NFTCollection</code> class |

## Methods

| Method                                                                              | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [burn(tokenId)](./sdk.nftcollection.burn.md)                                        |           | Burn a single NFT                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [getAddress()](./sdk.nftcollection.getaddress.md)                                   |           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [getMintTransaction(receiver, metadata)](./sdk.nftcollection.getminttransaction.md) |           | Construct a mint transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a mint transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution. |
| [isTransferRestricted()](./sdk.nftcollection.istransferrestricted.md)               |           | Get whether users can transfer NFTs from this contract                                                                                                                                                              |
| [mint(metadata)](./sdk.nftcollection.mint.md)                                       |           | Mint a unique NFT                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [mintBatch(metadata)](./sdk.nftcollection.mintbatch.md)                             |           | Mint Many unique NFTs                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [mintBatchTo(walletAddress, metadata)](./sdk.nftcollection.mintbatchto.md)          |           | Mint Many unique NFTs                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [mintTo(walletAddress, metadata)](./sdk.nftcollection.mintto.md)                    |           | Mint a unique NFT                                                                                                                                                                                                   |

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class NFTCollection extends StandardErc721<TokenERC721>
```

**Extends:** [StandardErc721](./sdk.standarderc721.md)&lt;TokenERC721&gt;
